entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Naujaat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
